title: Ticket #1958: -schedd-{daemon-ad,address}-file options to condor_submit_dag
description: Arguments -schedd-daemon-ad-file and -schedd-address-file were added to condor_submit_dag. They take full paths to a file dropped by the condor_schedd. Either SCHEDD_DAEMON_AD_FILE or SCHEDD_ADDRESS_FILE from config, which default to $(SPOOL)/.schedd_classad and $(SPOOL)/.schedd_address respectively. They allow condor_submit_dag and subsequent condor_dagman calls to a Schedd to avoid lookups in the Collector.
check_ins: 2011-Aug-17 15:44   Check-in [26828]: Document -schedd-{daemon-ad,address}-file for condor_submit_dag (#1958). (By Cathrin Weiss )
creator: matt
